ygData.subject: Re: Boat Problems
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Other than actually getting it to happen, I have no problem with convincing Verant that the game needs a legitimate way to do reasonably accurate mapping
ygData.messageBody:
At 05:06 PM 6/24/99 -0400, John Kim wrote:
>I still say that compasses need to give exact headings before
>/loc is gimped. Then they could add surveying equipment so we
>diehard explorer/roleplayers could develop maps by surveying
>and triangulating distances... :-)

Other than actually getting it to happen, I have no problem with convincing
Verant that the game needs a legitimate way to do reasonably accurate
mapping and adding or modifying features to do that.

It would be funny to be tapped for guard duty to watch for nasties while a
surveying team figured out the heights of some of the hills for a
topographical map. :-)}

Bob
